CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The onset oxidation potential ( E ox ) / onset reduction potential ( E red ) of PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO are 0.75 / -0.97 and 0.90 / -1.02 V vs Ag / AgCl , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTDTBT |
| PzNDTDTBO |

The two "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are "PzNDTDTBT" and "PzNDTDTBO".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTDTBT |
| PzNDTDTBO |

The two entities in the paragraph, "PzNDTDTBT" and "PzNDTDTBO", are the only valid "Material Name" entities. The other terms in the paragraph, such as "onset oxidation potential", "onset reduction potential", "V vs Ag / AgCl", and numbers are not "Material Name" entities.

| onset reduction potential |

The paragraph mentions the onset oxidation potential (E ox) and onset reduction potential (E red) of two compounds, PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO. These properties are used to describe the electrochemical behavior of the compounds.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the paragraph, I have determined that both "onset oxidation potential" and "onset reduction potential" are indeed material properties. Therefore, there are no entities to remove, and the valid entities are as follows:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| onset oxidation potential |
| onset reduction potential |

These properties describe the electrochemical behavior of the compounds PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO.
